cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 90 mi (145 km) south of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest, forecast to skirt the lower Florida Keys, then track northwest across the eastern Gulf of Mexico and turn north toward the Florida Panhandle / Alabama coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Panhandle or southern Alabama coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch/Warning confined to the Florida Keys and will likely extend to the northern Gulf Coast; none issued for the Mid-Atlantic.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning in effect for the Florida Keys west of Seven Mile Bridge to the Dry Tortugas.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys, eastern Gulf of Mexico, Florida Panhandle, Alabamaâ€“Mississippi coast; inland track into Southeast U.S.
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed (no Mid-Atlantic site included in NHC wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at South Jersey Port Corp, NJ within the 5-day window.
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture could bring scattered showers late in the week, but heavy rainfall (>4 in) is not indicated.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would affect port operations during the forecast period.
